arts.ttl: Pavlovic looking forward to ‘great’ Juve clash as Milan have ‘more confidence’
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Strahinja Pavlovic briefly spoke to the media ahead of AC Milan’s game against Juventus, which is an opportunity for the Rossoneri to make it five consecutive wins. It has indeed been a good start to the season for Milan and Pavlovic has played a pretty big part. arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Massimiliano Allegri has named the AC Milan side that will take on Juventus, and continuity is the key once again. Milan approach the game in good form and in good health. arts.ttl: Pulisic drives Milan’s attack yet Juventus still a challenging barrier
arts.sum: Milan are preparing to face Juventus at the Allianz Stadium in Turin for Matchday 6 of the 2025/26 Serie A season. The Rossoneri, coached by Allegri, will take on Tudor’s side in a match expected to deliver plenty of drama. Both teams are in strong form, with Milan aiming to extend their winning streak. arts.ttl: MN: Curva Sud not present at Juventus-Milan due to protest – the reason
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher The Curva Sud will not be present to cheer on AC Milan at the Allianz Stadium on Sunday night as they are protesting about ticket prices. As MilanNews report, for yet another year, the Curva Sud Milano will not be traveling to Turin. arts.ttl: ‘So many emotions’ – Juventus boss Tudor lays out expectations ahead of Milan clash
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Juventus head coach Igor Tudor has heaped praise on his compatriot Luka Modric, while also commenting on the battle with Massimiliano Allegri. arts.ttl: A 230-minute goal drought: All the key stats ahead of Juventus vs. Milan
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Juventus and AC Milan will add another instalment of their historic rivalry on Sunday night when they face off in Turin. This fixture has been played 289 times and Juventus hold an advantage, with 89 wins against Milan’s 66. A whopping 73 of them have ended in draws, though, which tells its own story about […] The post A 230-minute goal drought: All the key stats ahead of Juventus vs. Milan appeared first on SempreMilan.
